description:
I have follow the links to install OCCI:
 http://www.cloudcomp.ch/2012/06/updated-occi-openstack-install-guide/
      I have try to install OCCI in ubuntu 12.04 server,but it throw the following exceptions.
Please help me....
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/stack/nova/bin/nova-manage", line 92, in <module>
    from nova.compute import instance_types
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/compute/__init__.py", line 24, in <module>
    API = nova.utils.import_class(nova.flags.FLAGS.compute_api_class)
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/utils.py", line 76, in import_class
    __import__(mod_str)
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/compute/api.py", line 38, in <module>
    import nova.image
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/image/__init__.py", line 22, in <module>
    from nova.image import glance
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/image/glance.py", line 44, in <module>
    GlanceClient = utils.import_class('glance.client.Client')
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/utils.py", line 80, in import_class
    raise exception.ClassNotFound(class_name=class_str, exception=exc)
nova.exception.ClassNotFound: Class Client could not be found: No module named client
++ failed
++ local r=1
++ set +o xtrace
root@ubuntu:/opt/devstack#
title: OCCI Could not installed in Ubuntu 12.04

comments.content:
I have follow the links to install OCCI:
 http://www.cloudcomp.ch/2012/06/updated-occi-openstack-install-guide/
      I have try to install OCCI in ubuntu 12.04 server,but it throw the following exceptions.
Please help me....
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/stack/nova/bin/nova-manage", line 92, in <module>
    from nova.compute import instance_types
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/compute/__init__.py", line 24, in <module>
    API = nova.utils.import_class(nova.flags.FLAGS.compute_api_class)
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/utils.py", line 76, in import_class
    __import__(mod_str)
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/compute/api.py", line 38, in <module>
    import nova.image
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/image/__init__.py", line 22, in <module>
    from nova.image import glance
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/image/glance.py", line 44, in <module>
    GlanceClient = utils.import_class('glance.client.Client')
  File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/utils.py", line 80, in import_class
    raise exception.ClassNotFound(class_name=class_str, exception=exc)
nova.exception.ClassNotFound: Class Client could not be found: No module named client
++ failed
++ local r=1
++ set +o xtrace
root@ubuntu:/opt/devstack#
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~santhosh9445

comments.content: This is not a bug in Nova. It's a bug in third-party instructions for installing third-party support for a third-party API. I suggest you contact the writers on the instructions you followed. If that fails, you could start a thread on the openstack mailing-list calling for help, in case someone knows the answer.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: Please place the bug notice here: https://github.com/tmetsch/occi-os/issues
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~andy-edmonds
